feed.title: Shanshan Zhu
feed.subtitle: Computational Scientist Lead & Associate Director, specializing in computational biology, multi-omics, imaging analytics & AI-driven translational science.

entry.title: Welcome to my site
entry.content:
I’ve launched this site to share selected projects and thoughts on computational biology, imaging analytics, and AI in healthcare. I’ll post occasionally about methods, case studies, and lessons learned from translational programs.

If there’s a topic you’d like me to cover, feel free to reach out via the Contact page.
entry.summary: I’ve launched this site to share selected projects and thoughts on computational biology, imaging analytics, and AI in healthcare. I’ll post occasionally about methods, case studies, and lessons learned from translational programs.
